item.title: Please help! so simple, just forgot!
item.dc:creator: @deathbysniper97 deathbysniper97
item.description:
@deathbysniper97 wrote:

[quote=“Ljelvin, post:1, topic:477773”]On my client, in the run.bat it says:

@echo off title Client cd bin java client 10 0 highmem members 32 pause

but this won’t run. can you tell me why please?[/quote]

it should look something like:

@echo off title Client cd ./Class/ "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre7\bin\java.exe" -Xmx500m -cp .; Gui 30 0 lowmem members 32 pause

maybe try this…

@echo off title Client cd bin "C:\Program Files\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe" client 10 0 highmem members 32 pause

change the “jre6” to your version of java (either “jre6” or “jre7”)

Read full topic
item.source: Please help! so simple, just forgot!

item.title: Please help! so simple, just forgot!
item.dc:creator: @Ljelvin Ljelvin
item.description:
@Ljelvin wrote:

On my client, in the run.bat it says:

@echo off
title Client
cd bin
java client 10 0 highmem members 32
pause

but this won’t run. can you tell me why please?
